document_data.caption: ''Neverwinter under siege.''
document_data.name: Siege of Neverwinter
document_data.casualties2: Heavy, including the dracolich and the [[Harbinger]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Siege of Neverwinter''' was a conflict between the forces of [[Neverwinter]] and the [[Thay]]an forces under [[Valindra Shadowmantle]] that took place in the [[1479 DR|Year of the Ageless One, 1479 DR]].
document_data.Aftermath: After their defeat, Valindra and the Red Wizards were forced to flee from the heart of the city. They took refuge in [[Neverdeath]], and began to plot their next movement. In the following weeks, several factions and individuals tried to take advantage of the chaos caused by the attack to advance their own agendas.
